group_1.textRight: Inui Itsumi. You're in rough shape.
Did you fight the Sleepwalking Ghost?
Even with your powers, you couldn't stop her,@could you?
She won't listen to common sense or reason.
On top of that, she has an incredible ability@to survive and persevere.
If you weren't being targeted by her @personally, you should have given up.
I wish I could help you.
But your emotional state is even worse than @your physical wounds.
Your Soul Gem is almost completely tainted.
We may be in a hospital, but it's too late @for you.
Human doctors won't be able to save you.

group_1.textLeft: There's no point in continuing to live...

group_1.textRight: Why would I kill you? I would never do that.

group_1.textLeft: Please... Don't worry about me... Hurry...or@I'll turn into a...

group_1.textRight: You'll turn into a Witch for us, right?@I appreciate it, Inui.
Thank you for finally being useful to us@in the end.

group_1.textCenter: She became a stronger Witch than I expected.
We were able to obtain more than enough@energy.
But now we have another problem.
